titleStmt.title: The history of His Sacred Majesty Charles the II, third monarch of Great Britain, crowned King of Scotland, at Scoone the first of Ianuary 1650 begun from the death of his royall father of happy memory, and continued to the present year, 1660 / by a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: Dauncey, John, fl. 1663.

notesStmt.note: "The epistle dedicatory" is signed: I.D. [i.e., John Dauncey].
Written by John Dauncey. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
